issue.title: [CF 1299] Allow dragging of the icon thumb for reordering metas
issue.body:
Jerry thinks it would be a good idea to be able to drag the icon next to the dropdowns when configurating a meta icon to be able to reorder them. I agree. Thanks, Herry!


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras | Imported from CurseForge issue #1299 | Raw
